roleset.name: fall away in flaky pieces

role.descr: resulting state of arg 1, often prepositional

example.name: eww...
example.text: Excessive scratching has caused flaking of the skin into frosted flakes shaped pieces.

roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to flake.01. Flake.01 is a member of VN class carve-21.2. Framed by Katie.
